questions.question: A machine learning specialist is using SageMaker Data Wrangler to prepare a dataset that contains missing values. The specialist must handle these missing values before training the model. Which TWO methods can SageMaker Data Wrangler offer for handling missing data? (Choose two.)
options: Imputing missing values using pandas or PySpark
correct_answers: Imputing missing values using pandas or PySpark
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate MLA-C01
